items.title: Exercise 1: Security Alert Email
items.text:
SECURITY ALERT: Potential Phishing Campaign

Dear Team,

We have been informed of a sophisticated phishing campaign targeting administrative staff. Emails appearing to be from 'HR Payroll' are being sent to employees, asking them to 'verify' their bank details via a suspicious link.

Staff members receiving such emails should not click on any links. Any data provided via these links could be used for identity theft. The IT team, whom we have alerted, is currently blocking the sender's domain. 

Remember: Security protocols established by the company must be followed at all times. Passwords shared with others or stored in plain text are a major risk factor. 

Stay vigilant,
Cyber Security Team

questions.question: What is the specific threat mentioned in the email?
options: A phishing campaign targeting admin staff
questions.explanation: The email title and first paragraph explicitly mention a 'phishing campaign'.

questions.question: Identify a reduced relative clause in the text.
options: The IT team, whom we have alerted...
questions.explanation: 'Emails appearing to be from' is a reduced relative clause (short for 'Emails that appear...').

items.prompt: Exercise 2: Security Vocabulary. 'Encryption' is used to:
options: Make data easier for everyone to read
Encode information so only authorized parties can access it
items.explanation: Encryption is a fundamental security tool for data confidentiality.

items.prompt: Exercise 3: Reduced Relative Clauses (Active). Reduce this sentence: 'Employees who work from home must use a VPN.'
items.modelAnswer: Employees working from home must use a VPN.

items.prompt: Exercise 4: Reduced Relative Clauses (Passive). Reduce this sentence: 'The data that was stolen in the attack was encrypted.'
items.modelAnswer: The data stolen in the attack was encrypted.

items.prompt: Exercise 5: Security Chunks. To 'comply with GDPR' means:
options: To follow the legal requirements for data privacy
To share customer data with as many people as possible
To move all company servers to the US
items.explanation: Compliance with GDPR is a legal obligation in the EU and UK for handling personal data.
